website_summaries.verdict: This is a solid high-end mascara that creates a full and voluminous look on any set of lashes.
pros: Brush design of this mascara makes it easy to separate lashes to prevent clumping while adding volume
Formula provides dark and velvety appearance on lashes, giving them a full look
Once on, it lasts all day
cons: Tube contents thickens and dries over time, so may not last more than a month or two

customer_reviews.title: Goes bad quickly!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mascara! I received a sample of it from a monthly bag and it was amazing. Lasted a good long while, easy to apply, not clumpy, just great stuff. When I was out I went searching for it in a regular size. Happened upon this one and purchased it. It was great... for about 2 weeks. Then it was clumped, dry, and just really gross to try to apply. In reading a few more reviews it seems this is a fairly common problem. I feel like this particular mascara from this seller is being sold VERY close to it's expiration date (and this is why it's inexpensive). Will not purchase again from them. Completely disappointed with the quality
customer_reviews.author: J. Main

customer_reviews.title: If you’re looking to get more “action “ from your spouse...
customer_reviews.text: Since buying this mascara, it’s changed my life.. birds sing around me as I stroll down the street, my husband can’t control himself around me, sand my children all of sudden started to listen..... lol no seriously This is by far my favorite mascara ever!!! I have tried so many kinds. And I keep coming back to this one. It does run some if I cry. But not super bad. I highly recommend buying this mascara. And you can’t beat the price ($20)!!!
customer_reviews.author: mommaG

customer_reviews.title: This is what QUALITY mascara is all about!  AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.text: This is THE ONLY mascara I will use. It Cosmetics is an AMAZING make up line. It's created by both dermatologists and plastic surgeonsI I have tried literally every mascara out there! Do not waste your time and money like I did.....This mascara is the best. You only have to apply it once, It adds crazy length to your lashes, seperates lashes perfectly, goes on smooth and silky and not clumpy. Does not flake after several hours like other mascaras do. This mascara makes you look like you are wearing false eyelashes, super pretty look!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Believe the hype!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I was so pleasantly surprised! IT Superhero IS a superhero! Lash extensions ruined my lashes and other mascaras haven't helped them look any better. This makes it look like I have extensions again. They are long, dark and velvety! This is my new go to mascara!
customer_reviews.author: Mizukan

customer_reviews.title: Good overall
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a good mascara that will help make my naturally long lashes look more full. This product goes on easy and does a great job with filling them in. A quick coat & I'm good to go! The only downside is that it seems a little clumpy. I'm not sure if this is something I'm doing wrong, or if it is simply the nature of the beast. On the up side, it stays where I put it and really does a good job with making my lashes even longer & more full.
customer_reviews.author: DezynerMama

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: The best mascara on the market, I used to work at a beauty supply store where I was trying new mascara on all the time. I stopped trying the other brands like Dior, tart, or benefit because IT Superhero is by far the best. I will never go back to cheap mascara. Gives my lashes volume and length beyond compare.
customer_reviews.author: Nichelle R. Nicoll

customer_reviews.title: This is not IT cosmetics
customer_reviews.text: This is not the genuine superhero mascara from It cosmetics. It is hard to get off and flakes to your undereyes when you try to take it of and you have to pick it off your face. The brush is all wrong. You get what you pay for. I will never order again. I will go to Ulta.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Patrick

customer_reviews.title: My number one mascara go to!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite mascara. And trust me, I’ve tried a lot. It gives you a generous amount of product and can even be on the heavy side, but if you keep brushing through the lashes to separate, it thickens up and looks amazing. The best part is I never have fallout. I never have to worry about smudging. The wand is really long and easy to maneuver. I was always someone who would curl my lashes after mascara (bad I know), but with this one I don’t need to. It feels like it starts to curl my lashes on its own. There’s a small sample size too if you want to try it out first.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia Larson

customer_reviews.title: I wish I read the reviews first
customer_reviews.text: I, like many others, received a product that is either not the actual product or is an extremely old product. It was thick, slightly dry and sticky on the wand. Lets talk about disappointment and a ripoff! I love IT Superhero, but this retailer is selling a bad product. You're better off taking your money elsewhere, especially for the price they are asking. Good luck out there.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Woodworth

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: I have used Superhero mascara for a year now- i usually purchase it from sephora- this time i tried amazon & it's a completely different product- it looks the same but it doesn't go on nice at all and it is so hard to take off! It comes off in chunks & is so messy. I guess it's an imitation.
customer_reviews.author: gina rizzo

customer_reviews.title: This is IT!
customer_reviews.text: Pardon the pun, but I first got this as a sample in my Ipsy bag and I really liked it. Then I tried the next few samples that came in and then I realized how much I LOVED IT! All the other brands I tried didn't come close. I don't have very thick or long eyelashes and this doesn't give me the long and luscious eyelashes you see in magazines. That isn't going to happen for me, but that's ok. This mascara gives me just enough of a boost that it's natural and noticeable. It lasts all day and doesn't flake or smudge. This is my go-to and my only!
customer_reviews.author: S. P. Irving

customer_reviews.title: Crap formula or knock off garbage
customer_reviews.text: Loved the sample in my ipsy bag last fall. It was hands down the best mascara I've ever worn. I don't know if their formula changed, or if this is some knock off fake formula, but this is the worst mascara I've used. Clumpy and sticks to the wand, clumps my lashes all up. It's terrible. I cannot believe I spent $30 on this crap.
customer_reviews.author: Jonesey

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I received a travel size sample from my ipsy bag and immediately fell in love. I purchased two bottles on here, and the difference in the quality of the product is crazy. The ipsy one made my lashes so full and long. This product makes them look wirey, like spider legs. It does not separate the lashes, or make them appear more full. Next time I will order directly from It Cosmetics as I'm quite sure this one isn't the real deal.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend, large volume, FIVE STARS
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with this mascara and have been using it for years! I'm allergic to most other mascaras, so it took me a while to find one that doesn't make my eyes burn. It makes such a huge difference in the volume of my lashes, it is unbelievable! I would highly recommend! The only "problem" I have is that it can be difficult to remove from my eyelashes, but that comes with most mascaras that claim to be waterproof. 5 stars for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Lea Martin

customer_reviews.title: I love the volume this mascara adds to my long but ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the volume this mascara adds to my long but very fine lashes. They look great! However as on reader stated this mascara does flake some by the end of the day. My biggest complaint is how quickly I go through a tube. It starts running out and drying up within a few weeks of opening. Very disappointing based on the higher price. I'm still looking for the perfect mascara
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Chunky. Clumpy. Flakes off! Yuck.
customer_reviews.text: My wife tried this because she uses all the other IT cosmetic items. She did not like this at all! Neither did I. It was clumpy and flaked off after a while. It got in her eyes and was hard to get off with the cleaner made for IT things. She had tried a tube of it from a sample she got and thought it might be good but it's not. It looks chunky to me. Not a clean look.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony M.

customer_reviews.title: Long, dark and pretty lashes😍
customer_reviews.text: Love it 😍 must have it. Been using it for past 2 months, full size bottle. makes my lashes so long and so dark. But...carefully apply cause it will clump. I learned. Also don’t like the ring of mascara around bottle after opening and applying. I always clean it. It does Waste some of the product 😞sadly. But can’t beat how my long my lashes look😍 I recommend this mascara
customer_reviews.author: ruthann morrisey

customer_reviews.title: Never again!
customer_reviews.text: Mascara came and the lid was cracked. I was hesitant about buying this expensive mascara and never will again. Because the top was broken, the mascara was all dried out!
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Looks good for short periods of time.
customer_reviews.text: Not bad, def gives some extra length and volume but the brush clumps your lashes easily. And will come off or smudge with the smallest bit of water or sweat. Also flakes after a few hours so you’ll have some black specs under your eyes. If your just looking for something for a photo shoot to give you a little extra oomph though this stuff is for you.
customer_reviews.author: KE

customer_reviews.title: It broke, I can't use it!!
customer_reviews.text: I only used this mascara 5 times and it was great but, it broke!! The tube inside broke, making it impossible to use!! The brush it just wet and full of the mascara gel!! Sucks, because I really liked it on. Hard to remove without pulling out your lashes!!
customer_reviews.author: Connie A.

customer_reviews.title: Phone
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT the same Super Hero mascara you would get in a retail store like Ulta. It goes on watery and flakes off through the day. Impossible to get off completely even with good makeup remover. I’ve pulled half my eye lashes out trying to get it off. It’s cheaper in the store to get quality stuff! Don’t waste your money on this phony junk.
customer_reviews.author: Cory B. Coleman

customer_reviews.title: I'm not buying this again. Not worth losing $30
customer_reviews.text: I do love this item very much!! I've had amazing results!! Just like my friend raved about, when telling me about this product, but I actually think I recieved a bad product, because mine won't stop clumping!! Very badly. It takes me about 10-15 min to just put on mascara and get a decent look.... My friends eyes look so much better than mine. I'm terrified of requesting another bottle. I think I'm don't spending this much money again on my eyes. Not worth the loss!!
customer_reviews.author: DTally76

customer_reviews.title: The absolute best in the game
customer_reviews.text: This mascara will do you absolute wonders. It lengthens, thickens, doesn't get clumpy, layers amazingly and is just the best. I don't know how else to describe how happy I've been with this mascara. You can either wear it with a layer for a natural look, or layer it on for a full coverage moment. Absolutely buy this magic potion!
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Not goopy and lasts all day
customer_reviews.text: For the most part, I really like this mascara. I don't think it's goopy at all like many other reviewers have said. At least no more than any others. It goes on well, but it's a little thick. But stays on all day. I would prefer a brown/black color with my light hair and skin tone.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Dombovy

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this mascara!
customer_reviews.text: I originally received this mascara in my IPSY bag, and immediately bought the full-size product. It isn't waterproof so beware if that's what you're looking for. I don't use waterproof mascara so this was perfect. It lays on thick without having to continuously go over your eyelashes to achieve that dramatic look. This is the only mascara I will ever use. It (in my opinion) is better than "Better than Sex" and Clinique.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware. Fake Product.
customer_reviews.text: This product is fake. It is NOT the real thing. I feel like I'm putting tar on my eyelashes. It burns when wet. It starts out wayyyyyy to liquidy and then it clumps all of my eyelashes together. The real IT cosmetics brand is not like this AT ALL. I AM very disappointed in this product. Buyer beware this is fake. Go to your local ulta/sephora and try a sample of the real stuff if you don't believe me. This mascara is fake crap. Complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Rosenow

customer_reviews.title: The best natural looking mascara
customer_reviews.text: I have used IT Superhero mascara for a number of years now and have never been disappointed. It goes on smooth and silky, it builds long and natural looking lashes. I’ve tried those other brands that feel like you are putting on a goopy gloppy mess. Invest a little more money, you won’t be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: I like it enough to buy another!
customer_reviews.text: I like this mascara because even though it is NOT waterproof, it stays on really well, even when sweating! I use coconut oil to remove it. It rates kind of in the medium zone of EWG ratings. It does well with layering......I put on 3 coats to give a lengthening look. I just bought my second one, so that tells you something!😊👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Carol Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Not a “wonder” mascara.
customer_reviews.text: This mascara..not what it’s hyped up to be. Doesn’t last all day. You need to re-apply. You also need several coats. Even when using a lash curler, my lashes fell flat within minutes, I’ve tried a lot of mascara in my day, as I’ve been wearing it since I’ve been about fifteen years old, and I’m 62. Wont purchase again. Christian Dior has a wonderful mascara, Pump and Volume..that does everything a girl could want a mascara to do, and it’s easy to remove. I’m sticking with that.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Rigby

customer_reviews.title: The best mascara I’ve ever used
customer_reviews.text: I get multiple ones for my twenty something daughters and me. We all use it differently but we have tried a great many options and we all agree for right now, this is the one we like the best. My oldest daughter lays it on and looks glam. I am far more conservative. And it’s great for all of us.
customer_reviews.author: KCMS

customer_reviews.title: Super lashes in a twist
customer_reviews.text: This is the best mascara I have tried in years!! I have tried all the fancy and expensive brands but none cocees your lashes as well as It superhero mascara. It definitely makes your lashes look longer and fuller. I gladly recommend it and needless to say, I will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina Aguiar

customer_reviews.title: Great Mascara for sensitive eyes!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mascara in a trial size a while ago, and I LOVED it, it offers all of the lengthening/curl-holding power of the Buxom mascara I always loved, but it holds on without flaking for much longer, and it comes off with ease and a gentle cleanser at the end of the day. If you plan on crying a lot, I wouldn't recommend it without a waterproof mascara layered over it, but otherwise I think it's a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Isabella Richard

customer_reviews.title: Gave me 10 giant eyelashes
customer_reviews.text: The mascara itself is ok, doesn't flake or smear and stays put all day. Getting it off is worse than waterproof, even with a solid makeup remover and the wand needs to be bushier as it just made all my eyelashes stick together which looked like spider legs. I used a different wand to apply and it worked beautifully but again, hard to remove and inconvenient to use a separate applicator. My daughter used it and had the same experience so now we have a very expensive piece of trash, which is disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: GirlnFlight

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t think it was so great. I was expecting more. I had to put on 10-15 coats of mascara. Then it looked stupid. I was very disappointed. I tried a second day same result. No good.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen B

customer_reviews.title: Defining, lengthening , not messy to work with and goes a long way.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing and defining lengths without clump or mess. However a bit difficult when removing almost like you would encounter with waterproof mascaras. However a great mascara that lives up to its name . Would definitely consider buying again or trying other ones by the company IT.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia

customer_reviews.title: The mascara itself is fine but after using it for a very short time ...
customer_reviews.text: The mascara itself is fine but after using it for a very short time something inside the tube broke and I couldn't use it anymore, couldn't return since there is no way to contact a seller, so I had just to throw it out. Very disappointing. Not the mascara but the tube and impossibility to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen S

customer_reviews.title: this mascara is wonderful and goes on so easy
customer_reviews.text: I have used many, many mascaras over the years and rarely have I ever spent this kind of money on makeup. However, this mascara is wonderful and goes on so easy. No clumping or streaking. Very easy to work with. I am on my fourth tube.
customer_reviews.author: Chera L. Greene

customer_reviews.title: NOT AS GOOD AS WHEN I BOUGHT IT FROM MAKER
customer_reviews.text: When it first came out on TV I loved it. Second time I saw it here----kinda cheap. Clumpy. Awful. Last time I nought it from a Dept store (macs) It was ok. But never as good as when they first started selling from their own site
customer_reviews.author: QBee

customer_reviews.title: Mixed feelings
customer_reviews.text: This mascara works well, doesn't take forever to dry, and goes on quickly, BUT it is very messy, a bit lumpy, and the mascara exudes onto the outside of the tube and you have to wipe it off all of the time. I'm not going to buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Menobud

customer_reviews.title: Love!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best mascara hands down! It lengthens and fills in my lashes which have thinned out as I've gotten older. I ran out on vacation and had to buy Lancome mascara. I paid $28 and didn't like it at all. Bought Superhero from Amazon. It sells for less on here than at Ulta. Another wasted tube of expensive mascara added to my collection.
customer_reviews.author: K. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great mascara
customer_reviews.text: I use this mascara regularly. I don’t know if it dries out quickly or if I just use it a lot so it runs out quickly. Overall, the first 2 weeks of this mascara has great results. After that, you start seeing clumps and it goes on thicker than when you first purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: anita pangelinan

customer_reviews.title: MY FAVORITE MASCARA EVER!
customer_reviews.text: i have tried atleast 50 or more types of mascaras! this is by far the best mascara ever, i first got this from a makeup box subscription, they send us difference types of mascaras and makeup and this is by far the best! i have used this mascara for a year so i promise you will never buy another brand again! this make your lashes longer, more volume, and almost looking like you have falsies on! PLEASE BUY THIS ITS LITERALLY THE BEST THING EVER!
customer_reviews.author: Nadia

customer_reviews.title: Better to buy from ulta
customer_reviews.text: This is the only mascara I use because it adds length and volume better than any other I’ve ever tried. However, I ordered on amazon for the free ship but the product I got was older or dry or something and clumped on the eyelashes and was very hard to remove. I went back to buying from ulta and was happy again. It is still a little hard to remove because it’s meant to be able to stay on well and I also use a setting spray but that’s something I work with as I’d rather take longer to clean it off than have to smudging or giving me raccoon eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Nat

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't get better than this!
customer_reviews.text: Best mascara there is. I have sensitive eyes and this mascara is so gentle on them. Easy application. Easy to build if desired. No flake. Easy to remove. I've tried them all from your $9. mascara to your $140. mascara and this by far exceeds them all.
customer_reviews.author: Dezzy

customer_reviews.title: Secret Weapon
customer_reviews.text: Don’t want to let anyone in my secret to my eyelashes but I guess that’s not fair. This is by far my favorite mascara!’makes my lashes look like they are fake. They are long and full and beautiful with this mascara. When washing your face it comes off it big clumps but who cares about that.
customer_reviews.author: newtothis

customer_reviews.title: love the product but the tube is not made well ...
customer_reviews.text: love the product but the tube is not made well the mascara oozes out when you close it - have to keep a tissue handy and wipe it and I am sure it is wasting so much of the mascara by doing that.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Great Product. Horrible Shipping.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product but the packaging was in horrible condition. The mascara box was smashed and torn. This product is my favorite quality of mascara. It volumizes my lashes and is easy to remove but also doesn’t smear.
customer_reviews.author: Mrobinson

customer_reviews.title: Wish it worked the same as my first bottle
customer_reviews.text: Wears long. I am curious if they changed the formula. It doesn't go on as impressively as the first tube I had from sephora. I was amazed and WOWED by it and had to have it again. I went this route and it's just another tube of waterproof mascara. It doesn't extend my lashes like the last one did.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: I REALLY like this mascara
customer_reviews.text: I REALLY like this mascara. I get a lot of compliments when I use it! the only problem is that it dries out fast. I'd been using it for about three weeks when it started get too thick and clumpy. BUT before it was that way people would even ask me if I had extensions (and I don't).
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: I normally don’t spend a lot of money on makeup but this mascara is amazing. It goes on without clumping and actually does lengthen the lashes. The makeup stays on without smudging, but at the end of the day easily comes off. Perfect mascara. Worth the price! I’ve purchased three times!
customer_reviews.author: Monica Lees

customer_reviews.title: Goes on well and makes lashes look so great, but sadly flakes everywhere quickly
customer_reviews.text: This mascara goes on well, but within an hour it flaked all over my face. I'm so disappointed. Bought it after reading an interview with the founder of the company. I was looking for a good natural product. But had to throw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Burnzieny

customer_reviews.title: Eyelash Must!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this mascara. I’m incredibly picky about my mascara and I can say with confidence this is the best mascara I’ve ever bought. Stays on perfectly and gets every lash. Must buy!
customer_reviews.author: Ecbell

customer_reviews.title: No more fake lashes!
customer_reviews.text: No need for fake eyelashes or eye liner! This mascara is all what you need for amazing long full eyelashes!!!
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Best mascara ever!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was gifted this brand Several Christmas’ ago. I have repurchased over and over. I am a superhero IT mascara faithful! I have short lashes and sort of thin. This mascara lengthens and fills. Great stuff! Wipes of easily with micellar water and a cotton pad.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Bradshaw

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I love how it looks when it first goes on. My lashes look thick and full. I'm not a fan of how difficult it is to take off at night but at the same time I'm glad it doesnt come off super easy. It does fade in its intensity during the day but does last quite a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: bhosk

customer_reviews.title: Best mascara ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this mascara and won't use anything else. It gives you long full lashes almost as good as false lashes. It is definitely worth the price and once you try it you won't use another brand.
customer_reviews.author: AZPyrochic

customer_reviews.title: A long search to find the perfect mascara finally ended
customer_reviews.text: I am using Mascaras for over 30 years now. I guess it have been at least 50 different brands so far. From the cheapest to the most expansive ones. This is so far the best I ever had and worth to write a review. I use it for a couple days now and it was perfect from day one. It still looks good at the end of the day. Now black shadows, no crumbs. I will definitely keep on using this mascara. Finally my long search to find the perfect mascara ended. I am 43 now 😆.
customer_reviews.author: Werner Martin Eggers

customer_reviews.title: Super long lashes a plus!
customer_reviews.text: This was another product purchase that I had initially received in a subscription box and had to buy again. This mascara makes your lashes insanely long, it comes off easily but I did wish it lasted longer during the day.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Amazing mascara!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality mascara! It is so dark and makes my eyelashes way longer and also thicker too! It drastically changes how my eyes look and I love it. It lasts a long time and looks good all day. Not clumpy, I have no issues with this mascara. one of my absolute favorites.
customer_reviews.author: Chandler Haneke

customer_reviews.title: My favorite mascara!!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried almost every mascara out there and this one is definitely my favorite. It provides great length and volume and it is never clumpy.
customer_reviews.author: HollyBrooke

customer_reviews.title: Too thick
customer_reviews.text: With five daughters I'm always looking for the perfect mascara. This was just okay. A little too thick to be great, but okay for everyday use. I would not, however, buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi Foster

customer_reviews.title: Will never use another mascara brand again!
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST and I know cause I've tried almost all of the mascarade out there!! My friend used it once and now wants her own and she works in a cosmetics dept!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lashes started falling out
customer_reviews.text: Beware buyers! I will never buy this product from Amazon. Never had any issues with my eyelashes until I bought this. Buy from manufacturer or beauty stores. Shame on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: SunnyTampa

customer_reviews.title: Best Mascara ever!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this mascara! I have allergies that cause my eyes to water. Until I found Superhero could not wear mascara from April through October. I use coconut oil to remove this and it comes right off. I will definitely purchase this again & again!
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Knock off macara
customer_reviews.text: I believe this product is a knockoff! I absolutley love the IT Superhero mascara, but this one I bought off Amazon is definitely not the same mascara I've been using from IT. I was really confused at first cause it's in the right packaging, but the formula is so clumpy & definitely does not apply the same as the real IT Superhero mascara. I wish I would've read the reviews before I purchased because others are complaining about the same thing, but at least now I know I'm not going crazy.
customer_reviews.author: KATIE

customer_reviews.title: Best Mascara EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: I tend to be a collector of makeup. And this is by far the best mascara I've ever owned!! I just ordered my second tube of it. I get compliments all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Jenni Haines

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this mascara. I have short thin lashes. This makes them long and thick. I have purchased other mascara but nothing has been better than this. This is the real product.
customer_reviews.author: LWhite

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Super clumpy and very irritating to the eye. Saw on QVC and decided to try, either this is not an actual IT cosmetics product, it's very old, or their claims aren't accurate. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not doing as I thought
customer_reviews.text: Was out of town but got back opened package which my daughter recommended but seems dried up after only few uses. For price and company type I was sure would be good and my daughter likes hers very much. Looks great on her. I still want to try it but maybe new tube of it. I only use if going out to appt or something.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi rider

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Mascara!
customer_reviews.text: I have been purchasing mascara for many years and have never had something that worked this well. It goes on the eyelashes perfectly. The only complaint I have is that it gets a little clumpy in the container but because it works so well I am willing to deal with that.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: My all time favorite.
customer_reviews.text: It’s my favorite of all time. Yes it’s thick, but if you scrape it in the same tube you’ll be fine. The more you layer it the bolder they get. I used Blinc for 2 weeks and damaged my eyebrows. So I’m sticking to what’s good. It’s not water resistant though! Which is fine by me. But does remove easy.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandra

customer_reviews.title: Specks all over
customer_reviews.text: Super clumpy and comes off in specks as the day goes on. Completely not worth the money. Even the cheapest drug store makeup is better than this unfortunately despite being more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: Used to LOVE THIS, but not anymore
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased this product the same exact way (through this seller on Amazon) about 5-6 times now throughout the last year. Every time until now, it has been the most amazing mascara I have EVER USED!!!! But this time I received a very liquidy, gross messy formula that was awful. Not sure if they changed formulas or just really frequently have bad batches, or if it’s just a counterfeit product.
customer_reviews.author: myr

customer_reviews.title: Flaky mascara
customer_reviews.text: I received a sample size of this mascara in my ipsy bag last month and while I liked the length it gave my lashes, it flaked all over my face and in my eyes during application and throughout the day. I ordered a tube thinking maybe the sample was old because I wanted to love it but it is just a flaky mascara. It gives definition to your lashes but isn't worth it when it flakes off in your eyes right when you start to put it on!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Hill

customer_reviews.title: Best Ever
customer_reviews.text: BEST MASCARA EVER!! oh my gosh I get nothing but compliments when wearing Super Hero. This makes my lashes the longest and most volume ever. My eyes are a beautiful shade of green and this product just enhances them.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Not the same IT mascara I get from QVC. I don’t know if it’s old or what the problem is.
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed in this product. I usually order it from QVC, but this time I ordered it from Amazon. I have been using IT makeup for a few years now. I ordered 2 tubes from Amazon. It is so clumpy, it comes out so thick on the brush, then you have to try to get some off. It’s a mess, then all day long, your lashes drop little black specks on your face under your eyes. I won’t be ordering this again from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: It girl

customer_reviews.title: Clumpy
customer_reviews.text: I was highly disappointed in this mascara! It clumps very easily and sticks eye lashes together. I don't have time to sit and pick my eye lashes apart and try to seperate them. Maybe I recieved an old dried out tube or something? Waste of money and definitely wouldn't purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff makes my lashes a mile long! I am so glad I got a sample in my Sephora Play! box and ran out and bought a full size because I couldn't believe how much better they look!
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: "NEW" but not really!
customer_reviews.text: This has obviously been opened previously, and very messily taped back together. After opening the tube, it shows signs of being used! I'm very upset at the state of this "new" purchase and will be requesting a refund and full replacement!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph A. Maddux

customer_reviews.title: Gives me beautiful lashes
customer_reviews.text: This mascara is not clumpy at all! It coats each lash so effortlessly. and the best part is that it gives my lash so much more length. I go from not having any to having very noticeable lashes. by the end of the day, my lashes are still noticeable. it is a bit hard to remove, but isn't all mascara that's been sitting on your face all day? lol
customer_reviews.author: Roni N.

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: I have happily used this mascara for quite some time but purchased from other retailers. When I got this, I thought it must be defective. It gooped up all over the container, the brush, my eyelashes. Barely usable. I contacted IT cosmetics and was told Amazon is not an authorized retailer. So buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Edward C.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: this is 100% fake! nothing like the real one and SUPER hard to remove even with a Clinique makeup melter which works for everything. save ur money and buy the real stuff
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clumpy mascara even on the first use
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing for the price. It clumps each and every time with excess product on the brush. As noted on other reviews, the opening of the container dose not remove excess product effectively. Would never buy again as way over priced!! I have bought other IT products and have been very satisfied, but this one is horrible.
customer_reviews.author: SD

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with expired mascara
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this mascara regularly for a couple years, but I Usually purchase it at Ulta. I ordered it online for convenience but it was completely dry when I opened it. I’ve been too busy to return it but not as busy to leave a review.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stays on really good
customer_reviews.text: I love this because if you don't have I lie States that a very long this makes them look longer and it just makes my eyes look so much better
customer_reviews.author: Evans

customer_reviews.title: Wasn’t a smooth application
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I didn’t like was that it comes out clumpy when I draw the stick out. Almost like it was old. You can tell it’s a good mascara but that maybe I got a bad bottle.
customer_reviews.author: LaShayla36

customer_reviews.title: Rips out your eyelashes
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I love the IT eyeliner. But it is so thick I have to use a 2nd brush so that I don't look like a clown. Then when washing my face my eyelashes started to come off with the mascara. Will NEVER buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: krystal benitez

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is the best mascara I have ever used. The only thing I find at all negative is that it dries out very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stick with the sample size of this product
customer_reviews.text: I had a sample size of this mascara and loved it. It was the best. So I ordered the full size and it’s terrible. I believe it has to do with the tube and brush, not the mascara itself, but today is my third time using it and it’s a gloppy, clumpy mess. Big clots of mascara sticking to the wand. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Whalen

customer_reviews.title: Dry
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased this product several times from stores and this was the only time I ordered from amazon.and usually I was satisfied. This product was dry and lasted probably up to 8 uses. Horrible experience.
customer_reviews.author: Star N.

customer_reviews.title: Buy it, you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.text: Best mascara I've ever used. My eyelashes look so long.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product was open and ?used?
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. This is about how it arrived. Box was open and wand was greasy like it had been used by someone having lunch. I threw it away because I don’t know what might be on there. I will purchase it from Ulta. Just wanted you to know.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Schultz

customer_reviews.title: VERY clumpy and goopy
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't long before this mascara became clumped and goopy when you pull out wand. Very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: My fav mascara
customer_reviews.text: I have short stubby lashes. This is the only mascara without irritating my eyes that works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: I love this mascara
customer_reviews.text: I love this mascara; it's the best I've ever used. Wish they made a waterproof version but this is a little stubborn to remove as it is.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Bamberg

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Too clumpy, doesn't give the look of thick eyelashes, or false eyelashes. Not worth the money. Comes off like melted plastic.
customer_reviews.author: JKS

customer_reviews.title: Clumpy and goopy - not worth the $
customer_reviews.text: I tried using this product for a couple of weeks and it was so clumpy that I had to stop using it. This mascara is thick and did make my lashes look longer and fuller, but after having to smooth out all the clumps and then separate my lashes from the goop it just wasn't worth the extra effort. Went back to my cheap drug store mascara and have a new appreciation for it. I would not order this product again.
customer_reviews.author: joelle oland

customer_reviews.title: Thick and clumpy, not the original superhero
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a trial size in Ipsy and loved it! Bought this here and it is NOT the same. For whatever reason I’m not sure. There is so much product on the brush it just weighs down and clumps. The trial size made my eyelashes long and really had that ‘elastic’ look. This does not! Buyer beware
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wasted money
customer_reviews.text: This must have been very old as it was dried out and clumpy. I have bought this mascara a hundred times directly from a beauty store or from It cosmetics and never had this issue but I was trying to get the product fast, don’t make my mistake go to the beauty store!
customer_reviews.author: paulagarza

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this mascara! It adds enough without getting clumpy. Very nice :-)
customer_reviews.author: Rose

product_meta.title: IT Cosmetics Superhero Elastic Stretch Volumizing Mascara, Super Black, .30 fl oz
product_meta.description: Transform the look of your lashes in just one coat with IT Cosmetics Superhero Elastic Stretch Volumizing Mascara. Featuring unique elastic stretch technology that wraps each individual lash, this unique mascara is also formulated with peptides, proteins, biotin, lash-enhancing polymers and collagen. You are a superhero. You do it all and now your mascara does too. This is not waterproof mascara.
feature_bullets: IT Cosmetics Superhero Elastic Stretch Volumizing Mascara, Super Black, .30 fl oz

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
